response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we estimate its true worth to be $1,500,000. Considering this, I am extending to you an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return on our investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 1250000}
